model.query: SELECT max("value") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "ipmi_sensor" WHERE "host" = 'filesrv.rob86.net' AND "name" =~ /_temp$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(previous)

targets.query: SELECT max("value") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "ipmi_sensor" WHERE "host" = 'filesrv.rob86.net' AND "name" =~ /_temp$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(previous)
SELECT max("value") FROM "ipmi_sensor" WHERE "host" = 'filesrv.rob86.net' AND "name" =~ /^fan/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(previous)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("read_bytes"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" = 'filesrv.rob86.net' AND "name" =~ /^sd.$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("write_bytes"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" = 'filesrv.rob86.net' AND "name" =~ /^sd.$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
